abstract.t: This document describes an experimental optimization to BFD Authentication. This optimization enables BFD to scale better when there is a desire to use authentication where applying the same authentication mechanism to every BFD Control Packet may adversely impact performance. This optimization partitions BFD Authentication into a more computationally intensive mechanism that is applied to BFD significant changes, and a less computationally intensive mechanism applied to the majority of BFD Control Packets.
